channel.title: How to create a hamachi serevr easier then normal
channel.description: First of all downlaod a scource & client at this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php then scroll down to server downloads. Pick a scource and client BTW you are better OFF choosing a 317 scource easier for peeps to connect to. After you do taht go to this link to downlaod hamachi: http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/ afetr youve downloaded that open it up its called logmein hamachi tehre should be a ittle power switch click that. After youve clicked thatgo to the top of that and click network then click create a new network. Have any name just make sure it is not taken then setup your password it is crucial taht you remember your password its ok if you dont because u can change settins so u dnt have a password after that. Look up top there should be some numebrs example: 5.222.12.122 that is ur server ip adress thats how people get on ur server. Gl with your server and yes may the force be with you. Ps peeps ahve to conenct to your hamachi thats y u tell them ur network and pass so they can access ur server. :) :)

item.title: How to create a hamachi serevr easier then normal
item.dc:creator: @auzziejarrod auzziejarrod
item.description:
@auzziejarrod wrote:

First of all downlaod a scource & client at this link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php then scroll down to server downloads.
Pick a scource and client BTW you are better OFF choosing a 317 scource easier for peeps to connect to.
After you do taht go to this link to downlaod hamachi: http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/ afetr youve downloaded that open it up its called logmein hamachi tehre should be a ittle power switch click that.
After youve clicked thatgo to the top of that and click network then click create a new network.
Have any name just make sure it is not taken then setup your password it is crucial taht you remember your password its ok if you dont because u can change settins so u dnt have a password after that.
Look up top there should be some numebrs example: 5.222.12.122 that is ur server ip adress thats how people get on ur server.
Gl with your server and yes may the force be with you.
Ps peeps ahve to conenct to your hamachi thats y u tell them ur network and pass so they can access ur server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to create a hamachi serevr easier then normal
